about_the_game:
Reality Breach is a first-person psychological horror game that offers unsettling and tense gameplay in a confined space.

!WARNING!
This demo offers a glimpse into the terrifying world of Reality Breach. However, some features are not included in this version:

*AI roaming throughout the map,
*Additional interactable objects,
*Visual assets for in-game assets,
*Additional puzzles and in-depth story.

Add Reality Breach to your wishlist and follow for updates on the final release and development progress!

STORYLINE

Step into the mind of Theo, a game developer on the brink of exhaustion, driven by his desire for realism. Navigate through his house, solve intricate puzzles, and find a way to escape while evading the horrifying entity that now roams his home.

CHARACTERS

Theo:
Play as Theo, a dedicated game developer who pushed his creative limits too far. Working tirelessly without sleep, Theo’s quest for a perfect game leads to a nightmarish reality. Now he must face the consequences of his ambition.

Գ̸̖̯̘̲̥̈́̑̎̈̕ɒ̴͇͇͎̝͍͑̔́̓́i̶̡͍̞͔̘̍̌͌̎̿n̸̨̛̞͓͉̈͒͆̚͜Ẃ̵̦͎̪̩̱́́̋͊ɿ̴̺͎͍͙̟̌́̾́͐ɒ̴̠͎̩̘̙̀̑̎̈́͗i̸̢̛̙̘͓͕̓̌͒͌Ɉ̷̮̘̙̭̯̃̈́̏̀̔ʜ̵̫̯͖͖̝́̄̄́͊
The entity ɒ̴̠͎̩̘̙̀̑̎̈́͗i̸̢̛̙̘͓͕̓̌͒͌Ɉ̷̮̘̙̭̯̃̈́̏̀̔ʜ̵̫̯͖͖̝́̄̄́͊ ... CoME... [SeE]... Me...

GAMEPLAY

Experience the game from a first-person perspective. Explore Theo’s house, interact with objects, and solve puzzles to unlock doors and uncover secrets. Manage your inventory and flashlight. Your only option is to hide and escape.

content_descriptors.notes: Insinuated consumption of alcohol or tobacco.

name: Reality Breach Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7 or AMD Ryzen 7
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970M or AMD Radeon (TM) Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 or AMD Ryzen™ 7
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This Demo version of Reality Breach is a first-person, psychological horror game that delivers an immersive and tense experience. You are locked inside a small claustrophobic house and there is something there with you.
